solution_line_template: Before giving her coworker some coins there were {coins_hour1}+{coins_hour2}+{coins_hour3}+{coins_hour4}=<<{coins_hour1}+{coins_hour2}+{coins_hour3}+{coins_hour4}={total_before_giving}>>{total_before_giving} coins
The number of coins after given {coins_given} to her coworker is {total_before_giving}-{coins_given}=<<{total_before_giving}-{coins_given}={coins_after_giving}>>{coins_after_giving}
